author: chathura_ce
msg: Added multi threaded client for demonstrating load balancing and failover samples.
Added a statefull sample service to be used in http and soap session based load balancing.
Modified the axis2server.sh to take server name as a parameter.
Changed the sample client build.xml to run new multi threaded client.

author: sanka
msg: Fixed: WSCOMMONS-178 (Applied the patch - thanks Saminda)

author: schor
msg: UIMA-364 package hotfix-1 based on 2.1.0 level. Includes
README-HOTFIX-1 plus copies of the DISCLAIMER, LICENSE, and
NOTICE files.  pom.xml and MANIFEST.MF updated to rename the
artifact with the suffix hotfix-1.  assemble-plugin.xml updated
to copy the README-HOTFIX-1 plus the license, disclaimer,
and notices to the zip file.
